data.actual_result: When you click Connect nothing happens at first, but when you go back to the chat you can see a "Disconnected... " with a loading icon below the chat box, and you can't get rid of it until you enable your internet back or restart the app.
data.expected_result: Nothing happens, or maybe should display an error message saying Failed/Unable to conect
data.short_description: Voice controls show based on if you appear on the connected users list, not if you're actually connected or connecting
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure Discord is opened and active, and that you are not connected to any voice channel yet- Turn on Airplane mode or disable Wifi/Mobile data- Try to connect to a voice channel
